item.title: add Squash
item.description: https://www.squash.io/ - — creates a VM for each branch and makes your app available from a unique URL, Unlimited public & private repos, Up to 2 GB VM Sizes.

item.title: Add Tweek
item.description: https://tweek.so/ - Simple Weekly To-Do Calendar & Task Management.

item.title: Remove Base
item.description: https://www.cloudamqp.com/ - RabbitMQ as a Service, up to 1M messages/month and 20 connections free

item.title: Added Abstract API
item.description:
https://www.abstractapi.com - — API suite for a variety of use cases including IP geolocation, gender detection or even email validation
https://www.abstractapi.com/website-screenshot-api - API](https://www.abstractapi.com/website-screenshot-api) — Screenshot API handling resizing, multiple image formats, css injections and javascript rendering.

item.title: Move Vercel from PaaS to Web Hosting
item.description: https://vercel.com/ - Build, deploy, and host web apps with free SSL, global CDN, and unique Preview URLs each time you `git push`. Perfect for Next.js and other Static Site Generators.

item.title: Added Deta
item.description:
https://www.deta.sh - Deploy unlimited number of Node.js and Python apps for free up to 50k requests/month. Includes free DBs, Auth and email.
https://www.deta.sh/ - – Fast and easy to use NoSQL DB with powerful query capabilities. 2GB of storage for free.
https://www.elephantsql.com/ - PostgreSQL as a service, 20 MB free
